info.title: ExtensionsClient
info.description: Use these APIs to create extension resources through ARM, for Kubernetes Clusters.

put.description: Create a new Kubernetes Cluster Extension Instance.

parameters.name: extensionInstance
parameters.description: Properties necessary to Create an Extension Instance.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets details of the Kubernetes Cluster Extension Instance.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

patch.description: Update an existing Kubernetes Cluster Extension Instance.

parameters.name: extensionInstance
parameters.description: Properties to Update in the Extension Instance.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Delete a Kubernetes Cluster Extension Instance. This will cause the Agent to Uninstall the extension instance from the cluster.

200.description: OK.  The request has been completed successfully.

204.description: No Content.  The request has been accepted but the extension instance was not found.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.
Error response describing why the operation failed.

code.description: Service specific error code which serves as the substatus for the HTTP error code.

ConfigurationSettings.description: Name-value pairs for configuring the extensionInstance

ConfigurationProtectedSettings.description: Name-value pairs of protected configuration settings for the extensionInstance

AutoUpgrade.description: Flag to note if this instance participates in Extension Lifecycle Management or not.

ReleaseTrain.description: Upgrade releaseTrain this extension instance participates in - only if autoUpgrade is 'true'.

Scope.description: Scope at which the extension instance is installed.

InstallStatus.description: Status of installation of this instance of the extension.

ExtensionStatus.description: Status from this instance of the extension.

code.description: Status code provided by the Extension

displayStatus.description: Short description of status of this instance of the extension.

message.description: Detailed message of the status from the Extension instance.

time.description: DateLiteral (per ISO8601) noting the time of installation status.

properties.description: Properties of an Extension Instance resource

extensionType.description: Type of the Extension, of which this resource is an instance of.  It must be one of the Extension Types registered with Microsoft.KubernetesConfiguration by the Extension publisher.

autoUpgrade.description: Flag to note if this instance participates in Extension Lifecycle Management or not.

releaseTrain.description: Upgrade releaseTrain this extension instance participates in - only if autoUpgrade is 'true'.

version.description: Version of the extension for this extension instance, if it is 'pinned' to a specific version.

scope.description: Scope at which the extension instance is installed.

namespace.description: The namespace to which this extension is installed.

configurationSettings.description: Configuration settings, as name-value pairs for configuring this instance of the extension..

configurationProtectedSettings.description: Configuration settings that are sensitive, as name-value pairs for configuring this instance of the extension..

installStatus.description: Status of installation of this instance of the extension.

statuses.description: Status from this instance of the extension.

creationTime.description: DateLiteral (per ISO8601) noting the time the resource was created by the client (user).

lastModifiedTime.description: DateLiteral (per ISO8601) noting the time the resource was modified by the client (user).

lastStatusTime.description: DateLiteral (per ISO8601) noting the time of last status from the agent.

error.description: Error information from the Agent for errors during installation.

properties.description: Properties of an Extension Instance resource

extensionType.description: Type of the Extension, of which this resource is an instance of.  It must be one of the Extension Types registered with Microsoft.KubernetesConfiguration by the Extension publisher.

autoUpgrade.description: Flag to note if this instance participates in Extension Lifecycle Management or not.

releaseTrain.description: Upgrade releaseTrain this extension instance participates in - only if autoUpgrade is 'true'.

version.description: Version of the extension for this extension instance, if it is 'pinned' to a specific version.

scope.description: Scope at which the extension instance is installed.

namespace.description: The namespace to which this extension is installed.

installStatus.description: Status of installation of this instance of the extension.

creationTime.description: DateLiteral (per ISO8601) noting the time the resource was created by the client (user).

lastModifiedTime.description: DateLiteral (per ISO8601) noting the time the resource was modified by the client (user).

lastStatusTime.description: DateLiteral (per ISO8601) noting the time of last status from the agent.

error.description: Error information from the Agent for errors during installation.

ExtensionInstancesList.description: Result of the request to list Extension Instances.  It contains a list of ExtensionInstance objects and a URL link to get the next set of results.

value.description: List of Extension Instances within a Kubernetes cluster.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of extension instance objects, if any.

properties.description: Properties to update an Extension Instance resource

autoUpgrade.description: Flag to note if this instance participates in Extension Lifecycle Management or not.

releaseTrain.description: Upgrade releaseTrain this extension instance participates in - only if autoUpgrade is 'true'.

version.description: Version number of extension, to 'pin' to a specific version.  autoUpgrade must be 'false'.

SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId
SubscriptionIdParameter.description: The Azure subscription ID. This is a GUID-formatted string (e.g. 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000)

ResourceGroupNameParameter.name: resourceGroupName
ResourceGroupNameParameter.description: The name of the resource group.

ClusterRpParameter.name: clusterRp
ClusterRpParameter.description: The Kubernetes cluster RP - either Microsoft.ContainerService (for AKS clusters) or Microsoft.Kubernetes (for OnPrem K8S clusters).

ClusterResourceNameParameter.name: clusterResourceName
ClusterResourceNameParameter.description: The Kubernetes cluster resource name - either managedClusters (for AKS clusters) or connectedClusters (for OnPrem K8S clusters).

ClusterNameParameter.name: clusterName
ClusterNameParameter.description: The name of the kubernetes cluster.

ApiVersionParameter.name: api-version
ApiVersionParameter.description: The API version to be used with the HTTP request.

ExtensionInstanceNameParameter.name: extensionInstanceName
ExtensionInstanceNameParameter.description: Name of an instance of the Extension.
